forms.name: PDI (Pre-Delivery Inspection)
forms.introText: Complete all sections of this Pre-Delivery Inspection before vehicle handover.

forms.name: Test Drive Request
forms.introText: Please complete this form to book a test drive. You must bring your valid driving licence on the day.
forms.termsText:
By signing this form, I confirm that:
- I hold a valid UK driving licence
- I am covered by {dealer.companyName}'s insurance for the duration of the test drive
- I will follow all road traffic laws
- I am responsible for any parking or speeding fines incurred during the test drive
- I will not allow any other person to drive the vehicle

forms.name: Courtesy Car Out
forms.introText: Complete this form when issuing a courtesy vehicle to a customer.
forms.termsText:
TERMS OF USE - COURTESY VEHICLE

1. The vehicle must be returned with the same fuel level as when collected.
2. The driver is responsible for any parking fines, speeding tickets, or congestion charges.
3. The vehicle must not be driven outside the UK.
4. Only named drivers on this form may drive the vehicle.
5. Any damage must be reported immediately to {dealer.companyName}.
6. The vehicle is covered by our insurance policy. Excess of £500 applies for any claims.
7. The vehicle must be returned on the agreed date unless prior arrangement is made.

For emergencies, contact: {dealer.companyPhone}

forms.name: Courtesy Car Return
forms.introText: Complete this form when a courtesy vehicle is returned.

forms.name: Vehicle Delivery
forms.introText: Complete this form when handing over a vehicle to the customer.

forms.name: Warranty Claim
forms.introText:
Please fill out the form below in as much detail as possible. For more information about what is and isn't covered under your warranty please refer to page 5 of your warranty booklet.

We will only accept one claim per submission, submitting more than once may delay your claim being processed.

Please allow up to 48 hours for a response.

PLEASE NOTE: ONLY THE PURCHASER OF THE VEHICLE CAN SUBMIT A CLAIM AND MUST HAVE REGISTERED THEIR WARRANTY.
forms.termsText:
• I understand that I can use this form to report an issue however, it may not be a claimable issue.
• I understand it may take up to 48 hours to receive a response to this claim form, and not to report the issue again as this may delay the claim further.
• I understand that if I go ahead and undertake work without authorisation I am liable for the costs.

forms.name: Review & Feedback
forms.introText: We'd love to hear about your experience! Your feedback helps us improve our service.

formfields.label: Add issues that need attention. These will be automatically added to the vehicle's issue list.
Where did you find this vehicle?
I agree to the Terms & Conditions
Existing Damage Notes
formfields.placeholder: Note any existing scratches, dents, etc.

formfields.label: I have read and agree to the terms of use
I confirm the fuel level and mileage are correct
Any damage or issues to report?

Phone Number
formfields.helpText: Please enter a valid phone number

formfields.label: Please describe the issue in as much detail as possible
formfields.helpText: Include any warning lights on the dashboard, noises, symptoms, when the issue occurs, etc.

formfields.label: Upload Pictures / Videos
formfields.helpText: You can upload multiple files. Drag and drop or click to select.

formfields.label: I agree and I have read the terms and condition details above.
Would you recommend us to friends and family?
